Name: Holoswitch
About the game: *** READ BEFORE BUYING *** Holoswitch supports use on Windows 10 and Windows 11 iPhone users require an additional Bluetooth dongle (4.0 or higher) to receive notifications The mobile companion app requires a minimum of iOS 12 or Android 9 Holoswitch is a Virtual Reality smartwatch that connects to your iPhone or Android phone. It helps you to stay connected to the real world during your VR adventures by forwarding phone notifications and by turning your phone into a surveillance camera. Say goodbye to taking off your headset to check for messages or your surrounding! Augmented smartwatch overlay that can be attached to the left or right hand Easy-to-use touch interface that does not interfere with the VR experience Local time and date display Forwarding of Android and iOS notifications One-to-one mirroring of notifications Optional free-floating notification popup for usage without controllers Notification filtering to avoid unnecessary distractions Full emoji support in notifications Dismissing phone notifications from within VR Super easy VR video and snapshot capture Gallery including video and snapshot viewer Gallery syncing with the phone. The content will be stored on your PC and can be fully synchronized with the companion's app Streaming of the phone camera to VR. As a free-floating overlay or on the wrist watch to keep an eye on the environment *** The app does not connect *** If you are facing difficulties in getting the app to run and connect, please check our FAQ ) or join our Discord server . Alternatively, you can use the Steam community or send a mail to support@holoswitch.com . We are happy to help you :) *** Something is not working correctly *** We are always striving to improve the usability, reliability, and stability of Holoswitch. If youâ€™re facing any issues, bugs, or problems with setting up the app, we would greatly appreciate it if tell us about it. We're constantly fixing bugs to avoid these issues and giving support and guidance so please be fair and contact us. Thx :) Issue tracker
